page.title: 02GAZETTEER continued.
page.content: opened in 1894. Eastham ferry hotel was built on the grouds of an amusment park.The sailors used to go there for a bed and breakfast. The old Bromborough power station can be seen in this area.It is now closed because of a new power station is being opened in Bromborough pool. Eastham golf links stretch along side Eastham country park and carlett park college. Warrens farm is still called a Farm but is used to store things in from Leverhulme sports fields.One of barns is used to store goalposts in.
